    • allowCommand

      public void allowCommand(CommandEnum command, ClientSender resourceProvider)
      Description copied from interface: HandlingToolbox
      Makes the relative handling resource available for the given command (limited to the toolbox functionalities). Note that the correct use of the handling toolbox requires disabling all no-more-permitted commands before enabling the new ones
      Specified by:
      allowCommand in interface HandlingToolbox
      Parameters:
      command - the command for which the toolbox will provide the handling resource if asked
      resourceProvider - the provider on which the toolbox relies

    • disableCommand

      public void disableCommand(CommandEnum command)
      Description copied from interface: HandlingToolbox
      Changes the handling resources to make sure the given command isn't allowed
      Specified by:
      disableCommand in interface HandlingToolbox
      Parameters:
      command - the command to disable
